net.metarelate.terminology.instanceManager
Class OLD_Initializer

java.lang.Object
  net.metarelate.terminology.instanceManager.OLD_Initializer

public class OLD_Initializer
extends java.lang.Object

Initializer is responsible for initalizing an instance of the terminology server (e.g. directory structure). It can be called with or without arguments. Arguments override initialization default settings. If directories of necessary configuration files are missing, default versions are created.

Author:
andreasplendiani
